MRN_SYN_2_style_2: PROCEDURE: Endobronchial Ultrasound-Guided Transbronchial Needle Aspiration. Indications included LUL mass and mediastinal adenopathy. Systematic EBUS survey revealed enlarged nodes. TBNA was performed at stations 4R, 4L, 7, 10L, and 11L. Rapid on-site evaluation confirmed squamous cell carcinoma in contralateral (4R) and subcarinal (7) nodes, consistent with N3 disease.
